item.title: TRAFFIC ADVISORY: Meade St will be one way flowing from College to Camden Aug 17 7a-12p due to WVWC ... from Upshur County DHSEM : Nixle
item.description: TRAFFIC ADVISORY: Meade St will be one way flowing from College to Camden Aug 17 7a-12p due to WVWC student move in.
